<class name="control/longitudinal_controller" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
The longitudinal controller generates a speed command based on localization data and the given target path.

<class name="control/lateral_controller" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
The lateral controller generates a steering command based on localization data and the given target path.

<class name="control/speed_controller" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
Node that controls the speed of the car. The controller has real-time constraints and directly interfaces the engine actuator.

<class name="control/steering_controller" type="NodeletBase" base_class_type="nodelet::Nodelet">
The SteeringController is a pid controller with feed-forward for the steering angle of the car. The controller has real-time constraints and directly interfaces the steering servo actuator.
